name: Badenhausen Corporation v. H. & D. Lang Manufacturing Company et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Badenhausen Corp. v. H. & D. Lang Manufacturing Co.

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Badenhausen Corporation v. H. & D. Lang Manufacturing Company et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Schaffer,
For the reasons stated in the preceding case (Badenhausen Corporation v. The Lang Company) the affidavit of defense filed in this case is determined to be insufficient.
The judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Schaffer,

casebody.head_matter:
Badenhausen Corporation v. H. & D. Lang Manufacturing Company et al., Appellants.
Argued December 7, 1933.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
January 30, 1934:
